Text:
Thank you so much!!  I lost my copy of the White album some time ago. Glad to be able to hear it again.

Post more barbershop if you have it.  ;-)
Holy crap!  Hell yeah!  Thanks so much.  I have been looking for these.  Gave in and spent 99 cents on amazon for Go the Distance and now I can have all their CD's.  You da man/woman!!
